|brand = Hardkernel |model = ODROID-GO |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Advance Black Edition |revision = REV 1.1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = portable game console |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AC7Z-ESPWROOMS2 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = R-R-HKL-ODROID-GO-Adva |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3326; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A35 |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = XTX Tech;XT25F128B; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16LY-107:N; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 18:FE:34
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.09;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.189;EmuELEC;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C) |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, CON3 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, 3.5" LCD Display, Audio out 3.5mm jack, speaker, LiPo battery connector, I2C, GPIO, power switch |addchip = PMIC w/integrated CODEC;Rockchip;RK817;;1;,,, USB Power Distribution Switch;First Silicon;FC9516A;;1;,,, Overvoltage Protection Circuit;ON Semiconductor;NCP372;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2020 |estprice = 59 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08FNYY1W4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Korea
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Espressif ESP-WROOM-S2 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Espressif;ESP8266;ESP8266EX; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = integrated |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2024", "HARDKERNEL", "GO-ADVANCE", and "REV 1.1 20200522 Made In Korea" are silkscreened on board top. :"Made In Korea", "R-R-HKL-ODROID-GO-Adva" and "Design by ruppi.kim@hardkernel.com" are silkscreened on board bottom.
{{See also|ODROID#Models}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3326 @1.3GHz :Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A35 *GPU: ''Mali-G31 MP2'' *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 16MB SPI NOR, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *WiFi: Espressif ESP-WROOM-S2 (802.11bgn) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 *GPIO: 1x 10-pin port *Power Source: 3.7V/3000mAh Li-Polymer battery : recharge by 5V/1.5A via USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/05/03/odroid-go-advance-black-edition-gets-wifi-r2-l2-button-and-usb-c-power-input/ ''ODROID-Go Advance Black Edition Gets WiFi'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://liliputing.com/2020/05/the-new-odroid-go-advance-adds-wifi-and-more-buttons-linux-handheld-game-console.html ''The new ODROID-Go Advance'' on '''Liliputing''']
